section.title: Valve.VR.SteamVR_Input Class Reference

listitem.para: delegate void PosesUpdatedHandler (bool skipSendingEvents)
delegate void SkeletonsUpdatedHandler (bool skipSendingEvents)
static void ForcePreinitialize ()
static void Initialize (bool force=false)
Get all the handles for actions and action sets. Initialize our dictionaries of action / action set names. Setup the tracking space universe origin
static void PreinitializeFinishActionSets ()
static void PreinitializeActionSetDictionaries ()
static void PreinitializeActionDictionaries ()
static void Update ()
Gets called by SteamVR_Behaviour every Update and updates actions if the steamvr settings are configured to update then.
static void LateUpdate ()

Gets called by SteamVR_Behaviour every LateUpdate and updates actions if the steamvr settings are configured to update then. Also updates skeletons regardless of settings are configured to so we can account for animations on the skeletons.
static void FixedUpdate ()
Gets called by SteamVR_Behaviour every FixedUpdate and updates actions if the steamvr settings are configured to update then.
static void OnPreCull ()
Gets called by SteamVR_Behaviour every OnPreCull and updates actions if the steamvr settings are configured to update then.
static void UpdateVisualActions (bool skipStateAndEventUpdates=false)
Updates the states of all the visual actions (pose / skeleton)
static void UpdatePoseActions (bool skipSendingEvents=false)
Updates the states of all the pose actions
static void UpdateSkeletonActions (bool skipSendingEvents=false)
Updates the states of all the skeleton actions
static void UpdateNonVisualActions ()
Updates the states of all the non visual actions (boolean, single, vector2, vector3)

section.para: Definition at line 1062 of file SteamVR_Input.cs.

section.title: GetLocalizedName()

para.computeroutput: static string Valve.VR.SteamVR_Input.GetLocalizedName (ulong originHandle, params EVRInputStringBits [] localizedParts)[static]

para.para: Gets the localized name of the device that the action corresponds to.

listitem.para: VRInputString_Hand - Which hand the origin is in. E.g. "Left Hand"
VRInputString_ControllerType - What kind of controller the user has in that hand.E.g. "Vive Controller"
VRInputString_InputSource - What part of that controller is the origin. E.g. "Trackpad"
VRInputString_All - All of the above. E.g. "Left Hand Vive Controller Trackpad"
